title: A Secret, Failed Oil Deal: How the U.S.-Saudi Relationship Ruptured
description: After Saudi leaders pushed to slash oil production despite a visit by President Biden, American officials have been left fuming that they were duped.
dc:creator: Mark Mazzetti, Edward Wong and Adam Entous
category: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
Abdulaziz bin Salman, Prince of Saudi Arabia
media:description: President Biden arriving in Saudi Arabia in July. The administration thought it had secured a promise from the Saudis to keep oil flowing in a bid to stabilize prices.
